body.name: OIGAE Washable Rug 5x7, Abstract Modern Area Rugs with Non-Slip Backing, Non-Shedding Floor Mat Throw Carpet for Living Room Bedroom Kitchen Laundry Home Office, Multi Color
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 12 hrs 29 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Non-Shedding & Stain Resistant】Expertly woven by machine without pile surface use premium recycled polyester for a lightweight yet durable, and reinforced overlock edges which is virtually non-shedding, spill & stain-resistant; Eco-Friendly, environment first materials and manufacturing processes

【Anti-Slip & Foldable】The 5x7 rug features an anti-slip TPR backing that can help the area rug stay in place well, sufficient grip to prevent dangerous slides and slips, safe for everyday indoor or outdoor busy area for kids or pet's activity. Sometimes when you need a washable rug, you’ll buy a Rug Cover and a Rug Pad, now we combine them into one piece. One piece is all, you don’t need to pay for an extra rug pad

【High Traffic Area Rug】The ultra-thin area rug are made with everyday use in mind, its low pile height allows for convenient placement in entryways, underneath furniture, never get caught beneath doors and won't create a tripping hazard. Perfect for high-traffic areas of your home such as the living room, bedroom, dinning room, kitchen, entryways hallways or patio yard

【Stylish & Abstract Styles】This area rug grounds your space in a modern abstract design, showcases an artful, abstract pattern that complements any room with purposeful distressing and fading lived-in look. Modern rugs can work for every floor and space, from the living room, bedroom, dining room, entryway, or kitchen. You can always find a rug ties your home décor together, make your interior decor come alive like never before

【Machine Washable & Easy Care】With the stain-resistant and washable rug, you can simply toss it into the machine and keep it looking good as new after every wash. Machine wash in cold water and not to add bleach. Quickly air-dry due to the thin pile design; Use vacuum cleaner, broom, or wipe for daily care,easy to clean and maintain

【Product Note 】Washable Rugs may contain temporary creases upon arrival, flatten out edges by weighing them down with something heavy on each corner. You can also flip the rug upside down. Curved edges should lie flat within a few days after rug is unrolled.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Kids & Pets Friendly--- We care for children and pets more than anything. Producing organic and spill & stain-resistant rugs is our priority.

Our faux wool throw area rugs are made of enhanced synthetic durable fibers,not only ultra-soft but also resists color fading. Whether you step on with bare feet or laying on with your children or pets, you can feel the warmth and coziness underneath.Reinforced overlock edges which is virtually non-shedding. Sturdy construction can make area rugs last for years

We use the most popular TPR anti-slip technology. The TPR material on the back not only prevents the carpet from moving and slipping , but also increases the weight of the carpet and improve safetyThe low-pile design can make the carpet never won’t get stuck, convenient placement in entryways, near doorways, and underneath furniture and easier to clean. Suits for high traffic areas like living room, kids room or landing spaces.

Cleaning Instructions: Dust and dirt on the surface can be removed easily. Usually we can use vacuum cleaner or scrubber to clean the carpet, and when there are stains on the carpet you can put the washing machine to clean it.Easy Care: Please unfold the rug when you receive it. There will be creases at the beginning, please don't worry. Use your hand to gently smooth them out, flatten them on the floor and walk around, the creases will disappear within a week.

4' x 6' ---Best for: living rooms, dining rooms, kitchens. Washer size: 2.2 or 3.8+ cubic feet5' x 7' ---Best for: living rooms, dining rooms, kitchens. Washer size: 3.8+ cubic feet8' x 10'---Best for: living rooms, dining rooms, bedrooms kitchens or kids room etc. Washer size: 4.2+ cubic feet9' x 12'---Best for: living rooms, dining rooms, bedrooms etc. Washer size: 5.0+ cubic feet or Commercial Machines. Plus, bigger rugs make the entire room look bigger. If you have a sectional, you should probably consider this size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size, easy cleaning, and looks great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was very hesitant on purchasing a rug without seeing or feeling it first and I have to say when it arrived I was even more hesitant because it came folded and thin but I absolutely love this rug! Super easy to clean and while it isn't plush or plush to walk on it is soft to the touch and cleans nicely - Might be too heavy to throw in washer - I haven't tried but spot cleaning is super easy! The colors are vibrant and I just love this so much!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Huge! LOVE it! 9x12
reviews.reviewText: It’s not soft at all. Feels like an outdoor rug but I didn’t need it to be comfortable. I needed it to tie the room together and be friendly for dogs and kids. I’m curious to see how it will do in my standard washer since it is VERY heavy. I may just have to take it to the laundromat which is inconvenient but that’s ok. The colors are beautiful and match my couches so well. Creases won’t come out I guess it will need to be washed first. The doggies already approve.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for living space
reviews.reviewText: This is a 5x7 area rug and fits perfectly into our sitting room, great quality , thin do you may want to purchase cushioning or rug gripper for underneath it. Loving it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very thin and flimsy, so you really have to make sure it doesn’t become a trip hazard. There is no cushion to it, so it feels as hard as the floor you’re covering. As thin and flimsy as it is, however, it is stylish, and appears to be constructed fairly well. Threads are tight, with no inconsistencies.Would I buy it again? I honestly can’t say for sure. If I buy some anti slip matting, and put it under, then yes. That would give it some of the cushioning it needs, and might hold it down, better. But, it does make more work, for me, that I shouldn’t have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was extremely pleased with this purchase! The rug is very soft, and the colors were true to the advertisement. The thickness of the material was surprising. It was a bit difficult to place under the sofa legs because the backing held to the floor so effectively.... what a nice problem to have! I would definitely recommend this rug and will buy from this seller again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfect in my living room. I wanted a thin, easy to clean, yet decorative rug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Horrible to unroll, bad smell
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this rug bc a friend of mine had ordered the same brand but a different size and style and I LOVED it and with 4 pets it was important that it be washable.Here’s the thing.When it comes it smells like burnt rubber and plastic. I would smell it THROUGH the box. As soon as we opened it the entire room then stank. It’s been 24 hours and our entire upstairs still smells like plastic.Trying to set it up was SO different than a regular non washable rug. It took two adults almost 45 minutes and a lot of cussing to get it straight and it still has wrinkles in it. It came FOLDED RATHER THAN ROLLED which was so bizarre to me.It’s sad bc I had really high hopes but unless the manufacturer can provide some info on why it reeks of plastic we will probably just throw it away. Don’t think we could reasonably ship this back at this point.Big waste of 160$
